title: mukhyaprANa enna
sahitya:
mukhyaprANa enna mUla guruve


anupallavi

  rakkasAntaka shrI rAmana nija dAsa


caraNam 1    tande nIne enage tAyi nInE bandhi nInE baLaga nInE endendigu nammelara rakSipanu nInE
    caraNam 2    tAta nInE enage karta nInE vitta nInE enage vibhava nInE satya nInE sadAcaravu nInE
    caraNam 3    sukhavu nInE enage sulabha nInE EkAnta shrI purandara viTTalana bhakuta nijavu nInE
